newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: Trade was active in the panhandle area Wednesday. Slaughter steers and heifers steady to firm. Feedlots reporting good inquiry from buyers.

USDA said sales reported on 12,600 head slaughter steers and 5,700 heifers; 60,600 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 22,400 formulated and 2,800 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Slaughter Steers Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 65.00-65.25. Select, few Choice 2-3 1150-1200 lbs 64.00-64.50. Carcass basis Choice 111.00; Select 100.00. (hot weight delivered).
Slaughter Heifers Select and Choice 2-3 1000-1150 lbs 65.00-65.25. Select and Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lbs including heiferettes 63.00. Carcass basis Choice 111.00; Select 100.00.
Wk to Date: 60,600 Week Ago: 81,200 Year Ago: 15,500
